description:
These technical socks are double-layered to reduce friction as you move. Great for hiking and other long days on your feet.

  • Both layers are made of polyester, nylon and LYCRA
  • Inner layer is smooth against the skin and wicks moisture away from your feet
  • Lightly cushioned footbed
  • Stabilizer zones keep them in place
  • Mesh panels add breathability
  • Small fits kids shoe size 9-11.5, medium fits 12-2.5, large fits 3-6
name: WrightSock Escape Crew Socks - Children to Youths
